amendment.description: To provide a highway safety improvement program that includes incentives to States to enact primary safety belt laws.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2286 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 41. Record Vote Number: 9.
Motion to table amendment SA 2286 made in Senate.

Amendment SA 2286 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S770, S954; text as modified: CR S954-955) To provide a highway safety improvement program that includes incentives to States to enact primary safety belt laws.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2286 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 41. Record Vote Number: 9.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2286 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 2285.
